sitename: Integrative Health & Wellness ~ Aesthetics & Med Spa
cleaned_text: Wellness is one of the most diverse clinics in the LC Valley. We provide Functional Medicine, [Chiropractic](https://alignthespine.com/), [Aesthetics](https://ihmedspa.com/), Naturopathic, Massage Therapy, IV Nutritional Therapy/ VitaminDrip and Regenerative Medicine. Our [Aesthetics MedSpa](https://ihmedspa.com/) is one of the most comprehensive MedSpas in the area, offering everything from Botox and Fillers, Facials and micro needling all the way to Lasers, Tattoo Removal, CoolSculpting and so much more! If you are looking for a more natural way to treat your health issues and concerns then this is the place for you! Here at Integrative Health we provide you with the absolute best care! Call us at 208-799-3333 and get started on your journey to health today! Karen & Kurt Bailey, Owners Services Feel healthy, confident and beautiful in your own skin. Specializing in Motor Vehicle Accidents, Auto Accident, Work Injury and Personal Injury. Coming Soon... Several different types available. IV therapy is perfect for patients that suffer from any acute or chronic illness. More information coming soon. More information coming soon.
